statements: UPDATE Reports SET revenue = 5000, profit_margin = 0.25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Reports SET profit_margin = 0.30, customer_demographics = '{"age":30, "gender":"male"}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Reports SET profit_margin = 0.25, revenue = 50000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Reports SET customer_demographics = '{"age": 30, "gender": "Female"}', report_name = 'New Quarterly Report' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE revenue_report SET profit_margin = 0.25, revenue = 15000 WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 35, address = '123 Main Street', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE revenue_report SET profit_margin = 0.25, revenue = 15000 WHERE report_id = 1001;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET customer_name = 'John Doe', age = 30, address = '123 Main St', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 5001;
UPDATE revenue_reports SET revenue = 2500.50 WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE revenue_reports SET revenue = 1500.50, report_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE report_id = 101
UPDATE customer_demographics SET location = 'New York', age = 35 WHERE customer_id = 201
UPDATE revenue_report SET revenue_amount = 25000.00, revenue_source = 'Online Sales' WHERE report_id = '46813482-3392-4a58-bb76-38b73c4e9161';
UPDATE customer_demographics SET customer_age = 35, customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = '7dfa3e95-4c90-4ad3-bc29-ebb48e53e3f0';
UPDATE revenue_report SET revenue_amount = revenue_amount + 5000 WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE customer_demographics SET customer_age = customer_age + 1, customer_gender = 'Female' WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE revenue_reports SET revenue = 5000.50, report_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE profit_margin SET margin = 0.25, profit = 7500.75 WHERE report_id = 201;

UPDATE revenue_reports
SET revenue = 10000.50,
    report_date = '2022-10-15'
WHERE report_id = 101;

UPDATE profit_margin
SET profit = 5000.75,
    margin = 0.25,
    report_id = 102
WHERE profit_id = 201;
